description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Alloa Athletic vs Arbroath in the Scottish League One
title: Alloa Athletic vs Arbroath: Scottish League One stats & head-to-head
title_page: Alloa Athletic vs Arbroath: Scottish League One stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Fourth official has announced 7 minutes of added time.
Goal!
Goal! Alloa Athletic 2, Arbroath 3. Calum Gallagher (Arbroath) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Ryan Flynn.
Post
Attempt saved. Scott Stewart (Arbroath) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal.
Goal!
Goal! Alloa Athletic 2, Arbroath 2. Stefan Scougall (Alloa Athletic) header from outside the box to the bottom right corner following a corner.
Post
Attempt missed. Scott Stewart (Arbroath) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high.
